Class Lightning

  • java.lang.Object
    • Lightning

  • public class Lightning
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an animated lightning with (x,y) coordinate
    Version:
    5/22/19
    Author:
    Ashwini Suriyaprakash, Shreya Ganti

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lightning

        public Lightning(double x,
                 double y)
        Creates a Lightning object
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the lightning's center
        y - y coordinate of the lightning's center

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Loads lightning images
        Parameters:
        drawer - PApplet needed for the setup

      • shift

        public void shift(double offsetX,
                  double offsetY)
        Shifts the Lightning's location
        Parameters:
        offsetX - amount in the x direction the lightning should be shifted by
        offsetY - amount in the y direction the lightning should be shifted by

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws the Lightning object on a PApplet
        Parameters:
        drawer - PApplet on which Lightning object is drawn
